alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 12:48PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Mississippi, eastern Pemiscot, Dyer, Obion, northeastern Lauderdale and Lake Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1248 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tiptonville to near Caruthersville to near Heloise. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dyersburg, Blytheville, Union City, Caruthersville, Reelfoot Lake State Park, Tiptonville, Newbern, Halls, Ridgely, Troy, Obion, Clayton, Bradleytown, Heloise, Unionville, Cloverdale, Miston, Cottonwood Grove, Trimble and Hornbeak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...southeastern Missouri...and west Tennessee.
